tgt_original: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tathatāmiti |  no hīdamiti |  tathatāsvabhāvatvāttathatāṃ tattvato na paśyāmi |  ato'darśanameva darśanaṃ jñānagāmbhīryamiti matiḥ |
caryāgāmbhīryārthamāha |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre caratīti |  evamiti |  tathatārūpeṇa |
tattvena naiva kvaciccaratītyāha |  yo bhagavannevaṃ carati sa na kvaciccaratīti |
rūpādipadārthāvagame'  pi tadavyatiriktā sākṣātkartumaśakyatvāttathatā gambhīrā durbodheti yāvat |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathatāyāñcittamiti |  no hīdamiti |
tathatā'vyatiriktaṃ tarhi cittaṃ syādityāha |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathateti |
no hīdamiti |
saṃvṛtiparamārthayoḥ parasparaparihārāccittaṃ tathatā naiva |
arthādanyacittaṃ tathatāyāḥ sakāśāditi cedāha |  tat kiṃ manyase subhūte'  nyattathatāyāścittamiti |
etaduktam |  tathatāto na vyatiriktaṃ nāpyavyatiriktaṃ cittamātramidaṃ sarvaṃ vastu jñeyagāmbhīryamiti |
yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva ityādi |
no hīdamiti |  nimittānimittasañjñāpratiṣedhādbhāvābhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇe nimite naiva carati |
pi nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitamiti |  avibhāvitamaprahīṇamatyaktamiti yāvat |
kva caratīti kasmin viṣaye'  paramārtha iti |  nimittānimittadvayasamudācārābhāvāddharmadhātau caratyevamadvayagāmbhīryaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ |
tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva paramārthe carati sa nimite carati |
sarvadharmānupalambhabalānnaiva nimittamavinaṣṭamasti |  yadyevaṃ tarhi nimittaṃ prahīṇamiti cedāha |

mṛdumadhyādhimātrasukhodayena tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāstathaiva trividhasaumanasyotpādātpramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ |  prayogādiṣu vighnakaraṇāsāmarthyātsaṃharṣajāto harṣitacittaḥ prītiprāmodyajātaḥ |  tathaiva tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
tatra svasthāne bāhyamārambhāt kalahāyati |  rājakulādau vivadanādvivadati |  daṇḍādigrahaṇādvigṛhīte |
prahāraniyamanātparibhāṣate dveṣopanipātāddhyāpadyate |  krodhotpādāt doṣamutpādayati |

kathaṃ cānandetyādi |  tatra ekayānasamārūḍhāstulyasannāhapratipattyā |  ekamārgasamārūḍhāḥ sadṛśaprasthānapratipattyā |  samānābhiprāyāḥ sambhārapratipatterekatvena samayānasamprasthitā niryāṇapratipattestulyatvena |
yathetyanupalambhayogena ||  abhisamayālaṅkārālokāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāvyākhyāyāmabhimānaparivarto nāma caturviṃśatitamaḥ ||  pañcaviṃśatitamaparivartaḥ |
